netgest.bo.xwc.xeo.components
Class BridgeToolBar

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          netgest.bo.xwc.framework.components.XUIComponentBase
              netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.ViewerSecurityBase
                  netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.ToolBar
                      netgest.bo.xwc.xeo.components.ToolBarMenuPositions
                          netgest.bo.xwc.xeo.components.BridgeToolBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.security.SecurableComponent
public class BridgeToolBar
extends ToolBarMenuPositions

A default ToolBar for the Bridge component, includes buttons to add an existing boObject instance to the bridge, remove an object from the bridge and create a new object to add to the bridge

Author:
jcarreira

bridgeName

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.String> bridgeName
The name of the bridge to where the toolbar is connected. By default it searches a parent Bridge component and uses the bridgeName from that parent
